review: This thing is useless... Every day I'm pulling my TV out to unplug it because it stops responding or just plain doesn't work... It's bad enough I Can't stream local videos over the network like you'd expect this thing to be able to do... Except with the third party app "Videostream," which claims to be able to, but then complains about problems with your network that don't exist, and then somehow manages to lock up the Chromecast so that I have to go pull the TV out again and unplug it!
author: Ducky
